issue.title: [C++] Implement benchmark comparison between two git revisions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4827](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4827). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be a good thing to be able to write

```Java

benchmark-compare-revisions.sh $HASH1 $HASH2
```

and to be output a table of benchmark before/after/change for each C++ benchmark, to assess the performance impact of patches

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4827?focusedCommentId=16826196) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4141
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4141>
